text: He bani-adama sayatana yena tomaderake bibhranta na kare; yemana se tomadera pitamatake jannata theke bera kare diyeche ematabasthaya ye, tadera posaka tadera theke khuliye diyechi-yate taderake lajjasthana dekhiye deya. Se ebam tara dalabala tomaderake dekhe, yekhana theke tomara taderake dekha na. Ami sayatanaderake tadera bandhu kare diyechi, , yara bisbasa sthapana kare na.
